title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Cannot open file in another editor if it is already opened in one editor
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, it should give an error message when attempting to open it in another editor.
OB: When attempting to open a file in another editor that is already opened in one editor, there is no error message displayed.
EB: However, there should be a warning/error message displayed informing the user that the file is already opened in another editor.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor. 
2. Attempt to open the same file in another editor. 
3. Observe that there is no error message displayed. 
4. Expectedly, there should be a warning/error message indicating that the file is already opened in another editor.
